text: The Tragedy of Grand Cathay

Tzeentch's treacherous scheme has succeeded, and the Great Bastion built by the Dragon Emperor has crumbled. Chaos lurks outside, and the Dragon's children fight amongst themselves within. Rebellions have erupted throughout the empire, and General Han Peng is still defending Po Mu alone. General, please break through the Chaos blockade as soon as possible, rebuild the Great Bastion, sweep away the demonic hordes, and restore peace to Grand Cathay.
Recapture of the Great Bastion

The Great Bastion has finally been fully recaptured, and the northern enemy will once again face this unbreakable line of defense.\\nNow the Garrison's Will mechanic will be activated, and the Imperial Wardens faction will receive different faction bonuses based on the current Chaos threat level.
The Southern Duchess

The Great Bastion fortress has been completed, and the war is about to enter its next phase. The Southern Duchess, Miao Ying, arrives with her guards, weary from her journey. You keenly sense her gaze upon you, assessing you as one would a fine weapon. You have become the sharp blade she desires, pointed towards the north of the Great Bastion.
Undercurrents

People gather and whisper, discussing how General Fu Yuanshan's troops are not fighting the Chaos enemy but frequently intervening in Grand Cathay's internal affairs. What are their intentions?\\n(Occupying more than 10 cities within Grand Cathay will result in minor penalties to upkeep and construction costs.)
Ambition Revealed

Everyone is talking about how the revered General Fu Yuanshan will demonstrate his power to Grand Cathay and prove his loyalty.\\n(Occupying more than 20 cities within Grand Cathay will result in severe penalties to upkeep and construction costs. To remove these penalties, the landmark "Celestial Tower" must be built in Bloodwind Keep within the Chaos Wastes.)
The Emperor's Will

After an unimaginably long time, the Celestial Tower once again burns with a bright flame, casting the Dragon Emperor's might upon the Chaos Wastes.\\n(Fu Yuanshan has proven his loyalty to the people of Grand Cathay through his actions. From now on, participating in Grand Cathay's internal affairs will no longer incur upkeep and construction cost penalties).
Return of the Rangers

Since the fall of Chi'lei, the Great Bastion Rangers who escaped from the city have been harassing the Chaos garrison here day and night, hoping to retake Chi'lei. Now that the army has recaptured Chi'lei, the Rangers should return to their posts
Garrison's Will Mechanic Introduction

Garrison's Will is a unique mechanic for the Imperial Wardens faction. At the start of each turn, different status bonuses are granted based on the current Chaos threat level. When the Chaos threat is low, bonuses to public order and development are gained. When the Chaos threat is high, a series of military bonuses are gained.\\nNote: This mechanic is only activated when all three passes of the Great Bastion are occupied by Cathayan factions
Rest and Recuperation
The Chaos threat is distant; now is the time to rest and recuperate.\\nChaos Threat: 0-25
Muster and Prepare
The Chaos threat is approaching; all soldiers must be mobilized.\\nChaos Threat: 26-75
Vigilance and Readiness
The Chaos threat is imminent, form up and await the enemy.\\nChaos Threat: 75-99
Defend the Bastion
The Chaos threat has arrived, now we can only defend the Great Bastion with our lives.\\nChaos Threat: 100
Change of Hands at the Great Bastion
The Great Bastion is the gateway to the north of Grand Cathay and must not fall into the hands of others. Even if it means resorting to arms, we must reclaim it!
Cairn of Skulls

Roaring sounds have been echoing through the Chaos Wastes for days, but no one knows exactly what happened in the depths of the Great Bastion. All they know is that a few days later, a towering cairn made of Kurgan skulls appeared outside the Great Bastion
Return of the Dragon General

Fu Yuanshan is a weapon meticulously crafted by Miao Ying to combat Grand Cathay's long-standing enemy. Honed by hatred and consecrated with blood, this weapon is destined to shine in the north of the Great Bastion.\\n[[col:green]]He is now available in your recruitment pool, please utilize him wisely[[/col]]
